017package org.apache.juneau.html;
018
019import java.util.*;
020
021/**
022 * A collection of {@link HtmlWidget} objects keyed by their names.
023 *
024 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
025 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HtmlWidgets">Widgets</a>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HtmlBasics">HTML Basics</a>
027 * </ul>
028 *
029 * @serial exclude
030 */
031public class HtmlWidgetMap extends LinkedHashMap<String,HtmlWidget> {
032   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
033
034   /**
035    * Adds the specified widgets to this map.
036    *
037    * @param w The widgets to add to this map.
038    * @return This object.
039    */
040   public HtmlWidgetMap append(HtmlWidget...w) {
041      for (HtmlWidget ww : w)
042         put(ww.getName(), ww);
043      return this;
044   }
045}
